attributes.action: Raise awareness of people in poverty and help raise money.
attributes.background: I want to raise awareness of the people in poverty because they should be heard and should have the right to have food and shelter, article 25 in the Human Rights Act. People in poverty should seek a safe place to live, article 14 therefore I would like to raise awareness so money is raised to help.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.
